name: ilocation-spoofer
description: iOS Location Spoofer allows the GPS coordinates of iOS devices to be modified, empowering users to protect their location privacy.

scripts.start: concurrently "cd ./packages/main && npm run build-main-dev" "cd ./packages/renderer && npm run start-renderer-dev" "wait-on ./dist/dev/main.js && wait-on tcp:3000 && cd ./packages/main && npm run start-main-dev"

author: Armin Dizdarevic
